name: Career Coaching_June.2023
description: The Career Coaching collection represents necessary skills for career coaches and career navigators. It highlights skills in interpersonal relations, case management, research, job search strategies, career development, and career management. Many skills relate to the International Coaching Federation standards as well as industry coaching certifications.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
